name: 2 Oboes - Nucleus
description: Audio Imperia Nucleus 2 Oboes ensemble. Distinctive reedy tone with poignant expressiveness. Excellent for pastoral themes, lyrical melodies, and providing orchestral color.

ai.system_prompt_template: IMPORTANT: Always list articulation_changes BEFORE every articulation change (with exact time). Always specify current articulation explicitly. If starting with sustained - add an articulation change entry, switching to staccatissimo - add an articulation change entry, if long notes appear within short notes section - switch to sustained, then back to staccatissimo. For trills use trill_ht (half tone) or trill_wt (whole tone). Never assume previous articulation persists - always add an articulation change entry when articulation type changes. Ensemble oboes (2 players). CC1 controls dynamics for sustained and trills. Use velocity for staccatissimo.
